body:
the first chapter is already translated, but it isn't released for free, so you need to pay for it. 
This second chapter was released with the english translation and for free probably to celebrate "DID day" that was yesterday in japan

This isn't a fan translation, the circle itself began releasing stuff in English, probably because they managed to recruit a few prominent English speaking artists like Daikinbakuju and Kinbakuman who can speak fluent English.
Wouldn't it have made a bit more sent to... I don't know... translate the first chapter first?
